# NSPersonNameComponentKey | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

- [ NSPersonNameComponentKey ](/documentation/Foundation/NSPersonNameComponentKey)

-  NSPersonNameComponentKey 

Global Variable# NSPersonNameComponentKey

iOS 9.0+iPadOS 9.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.11+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
let NSPersonNameComponentKey: String
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/NSPersonNameComponentKey#Discussion)

The value of this attribute is an [`NSString`](/documentation/foundation/nsstring) constant identifying the personal name component represented in the attribute range. For possible values, see [Attributed String Components](/documentation/foundation/attributed-string-components).
